author: Medtep
description:
uClinics is an EMR based medical software designed for doctors by doctors
uClinics is a web application designed for doctors by doctors. It helps you manage your daily routines at your clinic improving the communication with your patients. Also, it enables you to access and share your files from anywhere on any device. Whether you are on your smartphone, tablet, laptop, you name it! . It doesn´t require neither installation or maintenance and offers you automatic access to new updates.

Some highlights:

✓ Useful: easy to use with a high level of user interaction 
✓ Safe: no risk of information loss, protected with international approved security certificates
✓ Easy: designed to reproduce pen-and-paper management avoiding over-complicated systems
✓ Customizable: select and manage information according to your own preferences
✓ Affordable: free and with no obligation for an unlimited period of time for accounts with less than 100 patients.
 
Features :

✓ Search Engine: fast and easy
✓ Manage members: set different user permissions
✓ Complete EHR: complete medical history, add detailed information
✓ Dashboard: quick access to your daily visits: study your patients progress
✓ Drag-and-drop upload: upload any kind of files/pictures to your database
✓ Calendar: schedule your clinic’s visit and sort your information
✓ Event creation: add new visits fast and easily
✓ Invoicing: study and compare invoice data 
✓ Mailing and recalls: add reminders to all your visits sort them and add notes
✓ Different specialty tools: tools with special functionalities developed for each medical area
 
Sign up now and join the community of doctors willing to improve their clinic management and their relation with their patients!
name: uClinics
